location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a letter from Mahomed Alee Khan [Muhammad Ali Khan] to Sir Evan Nepean, Governor in Council at Bombay, dated 14 May 1814, enclosing a request for assistance against the Joasimese [Qawasim] received from the Imaum [Imam] of Muscat.
